meanings.definition: Attempting or trying to do something
meanings.sent1: She made an essaying effort to finish her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: The essaying student tried his best to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The essaying squirrel attempted to climb the tree but slipped.
meanings.sent4: The essaying ant struggled to move the large crumb.
meanings.sent5: The essaying child persisted in learning how to ride a bike.

meanings.definition: Writing a short piece of nonfiction
meanings.sent1: Her essaying on climate change was well-received by the class.
meanings.sent2: The teacher assigned a new essaying for the students to complete.
meanings.sent3: The essaying about dolphins was informative and engaging.
meanings.sent4: His essaying on friendship painted a vivid picture of companionship.
meanings.sent5: The essaying in the magazine captured the readers' attention.

meanings.definition: To make an effort or attempt
meanings.sent1: She was essaying to reach the top shelf in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The team essaying to win the championship practiced hard.
meanings.sent3: He essaying to juggle oranges but ended up dropping them all.
meanings.sent4: The singer essaying to hit the high note strained her vocal cords.
meanings.sent5: The explorer essaying to cross the desert faced many challenges.
